A Study of Six University-Based Information Systems .A Marron, B Fong, E. Fife, D. W. Rankin, K. A methodology for categorically describing computer-based information systems was developed and applied to six university-based, NSF-supported systems.. The systems under study all operate as retail information centers primarily serving campus communities by accessing large commercially-available data bases using 3rd generation computer configurations.. The systems vary in design philosophy, mode of user service, transferability characteristics, and operational status..  A summary matrix is included.. .X 18	3	1143 119	1	1143 121	1	1143 122	1	1143 125	3	1143 127	2	1143 129	2	1143 141	1	1143 145	3	1143 211	1	1143 244	1	1143 299	1	1143 365	2	1143 376	1	1143 378	1	1143 394	1	1143 440	1	1143 452	1	1143 453	2	1143 459	1	1143 467	1	1143 468	1	1143 495	1	1143 506	1	1143 508	1	1143 511	1	1143 512	1	1143 514	1	1143 517	1	1143 520	1	1143 521	1	1143 523	1	1143 524	1	1143 526	2	1143 528	2	1143 529	1	1143 576	1	1143 580	1	1143 604	1	1143 609	1	1143 612	2	1143 619	1	1143 622	1	1143 623	1	1143 629	1	1143 630	1	1143 631	1	1143 632	1	1143 633	1	1143 699	1	1143 700	1	1143 705	1	1143 707	1	1143 723	1	1143 726	1	1143 727	1	1143 728	1	1143 729	1	1143 730	2	1143 731	1	1143 754	1	1143 812	1	1143 813	1	1143 814	1	1143 820	1	1143 822	2	1143 854	1	1143 866	1	1143 870	1	1143 871	1	1143 872	2	1143 873	2	1143 874	1	1143 875	1	1143 876	1	1143 877	1	1143 878	1	1143 879	1	1143 880	1	1143 892	1	1143 940	2	1143 941	1	1143 990	1	1143 994	1	1143 997	1	1143 998	1	1143 1078	1	1143 1079	1	1143 1089	1	1143 1091	1	1143 1143	6	1143 1230	1	1143 1247	1	1143 1257	1	1143 1264	2	1143 1302	1	1143 1303	2	1143 1366	1	1143 1367	3	1143 1368	1	1143 1396	3	1143 1435	2	1143 1436	2	1143 1436	2	1143
